Config module¶

Config has the most important parameter setting in the long horizon simulation study. - polygon_operational_area: the polygon used to define the safe operational area. - polygon_operational_area_shapely: shapely object to detect collision or border. - polygon_obstalce: polygons used for identifying collisions. - polygon_obstalce_shapely: shapely object to detect collision with obstacles.

  • starting location: (lat, lon) used to define the starting location for the long horizon operation.

class Config.Config¶

Bases: object

Config contains essential setup for the simulation study.

set_polygon_border(value: numpy.ndarray) → None¶

Set operational area using polygon defined by lat lon coordinates. .. rubric:: Example

value: np.ndarray([[lat1, lon1],

[lat2, lon2], … [latn, lonn]])

set_polygon_obstacle(value: numpy.ndarray) → None¶

Set polygon obstacle using polygon defined by lat lon coordinates. .. rubric:: Example

value: np.ndarray([[lat1, lon1],

[lat2, lon2], … [latn, lonn]])

static wgs2xy(value: numpy.ndarray) → numpy.ndarray¶

Convert polygon containing wgs coordinates to polygon containing xy coordinates.
